00002 from PyQt4.QtCore import *
00003 from PyQt4.QtGui import *
00004 
00005 class CursorLabel(QLabel):
00006     def __init__(self, parent=None):
00007         super(CursorLabel, self).__init__(parent)
00008         self.cursor = 0
00009 
00010     def paintEvent(self, event):
00011         QLabel.paintEvent(self, event)
00012         painter = QPainter(self)
00013         pen = QPen(QColor(255,0,0, 128))
00014         pen.setWidth(3)
00015         painter.setPen(pen)
00016         painter.drawLine(QPoint(self.cursor, 0),
00017                 QPoint(self.cursor, self.height()))
00018         painter.end()
